title: 3 bizarre (and delightful) ancient theories about bird migration - Lucy Cooke

multiple-choice.question: Who shot down a stork over his castle grounds in North Germany in 1822?
What was the theory proposed by Aristotle that involved birds transforming into different bodies?
What was the purpose of using aluminum rings to tag storks?
How many rings were received by Johannes Thienemann's team from 1908 to 1913?
Where were 48 of the rings found by Johannes Thienemann's team?
Who was the owner of the world's first permanent bird observatory?
What was the distance flown by some birds during migration?
How long did some birds fly without stopping during migration?
What was the method used by birds to navigate during migration?
What was the breakthrough achieved by Johannes Thienemann's team?

options.label: A
options.text: The discovery of a new species

options.label: B
options.text: The mapping of the migration route of storks

options.label: D
options.text: The identification of a new diet
